3. Freemium and Paid Tiers
3.1 Freemium Tier
Limited number of temp pages per month (5–10).

Short-lived page expiration (15 minutes).

Low-friction login encourages adoption and viral sharing.

3.2 Paid Tier
Unlimited temp pages with configurable expiration.

Advanced templates and versioned libraries.

Strong device-bound 2FA for sensitive content.

Optional link revocation and extended analytics.

4. Persistent AI Memory
Every temp page, chat, or reflection becomes part of a durable user-specific knowledge graph.

AI can reference past interactions and user preferences across sessions.

Weekly “reflection queries” are supported, allowing AI to provide insights that users can ingest back into the system.

5. OS-Level Ingestion (Planned Enhancement)
Prototype development underway for one-click ingestion via hotkeys (e.g., F4/F8).

Users will be able to capture text from any application and upload it directly to the system.

This will expand the system into a universal personal AI memory manager.

6. Security Model
Free-tier content: short-lived and low-risk, no 2FA required.

Paid-tier content: device-bound 2FA, one-device per account, optional revocation.

Temp pages remain unguessable, accessible only via unique URLs during their active window.

7. MVP Status
All core functionality is complete and operational.

UI/UX polished and tested across platforms.

Token-efficient AI integration validated with multiple AI assistants.

Ready for launch to early adopters, chat groups, and communities.

8. Launch Strategy
Release MVP to early adopters with freemium and paid tiers.

Track usage metrics, adoption patterns, and viral sharing impact.

Collect feedback for iterative improvements while maintaining core functionality.
